bug_report.Summary: <A section that summarizes the essence of the bug in one sentence. Answers the questions what, where, under what circumstances?
bug_report.Project: Name of project, program or application in which a bug is identified
bug_report.Version: The exact version of the software containing the bug
bug_report.Severity: The parameter that determines the effect of bug on program operation -Blocker -Critical -Major -Minor -Trivial
bug_report.Priority: Parameter that determines the urgency of bug correction -Hight -Medium -Low
bug_report.Status: Depends on the stage of the bug: open, in operation, fixed, rejected, delayed
bug_report.Author: Bug Writer
bug_report.Assigned_to: The developer who will fix the bug
bug_report.Steps_to_reproduce: The exact sequence of actions, which leads to reproduction of a bug
bug_report.Actual_result: What happens when you play the steps, how the program works now
bug_report.Expected_result: How the program should actually work
bug_report.Attachments: Links, screenshots, videos and other materials that will help the developer better understand the nature of the problem
